english.segment1: hear our praises. hear your people sing. hear our hearts cry. your love is everything
english.segment2: and all will hear this shout. as the nations turn to you. and this will be our anthem
english.segment3: 'cause we're all about you. and the world you promise. and all we have will give you praise. 'cause we're all about you. and the world can't stop us. living your way, always
english.segment4: let our hearts break as we praise your name. let the earth shake. this is the sound of faith
english.segment5: and the walls will fall down. and religion will break. and the nations will hear this shout. can you hear the sound of faith?
english.segment6: all the walls are falling down. as all the nations praaise. and all the world will hear this shout. can you hear the sound of faith?(2x)
